entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Blanc-Sablon

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 09:22 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: E 57 km/h gust 75 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this morning. Snow mixed with ice pellets this afternoon. Blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 70 gusting to 90 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow or rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
